V03vinv10_u:5: kāśiṣu vāsavagrāmake senāṃjayo nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati /
V03vinv10_u:6: tam āgamya vāsavagrāmakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:7: ye āgantukā bhikṣavo vāsavagrāmakam āgacchanti tān asau pratiśāmya sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā mārgaśrame prativinodite yeṣu kuleṣu piṇḍakā upanibaddhās teṣu bhoktuṃ preṣayati /
V03vinv10_u:8: yāvad anyatamaḥ sālohito vāsavagrāmake varṣā uṣitaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:9: trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīṃ anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:10: ācaritaṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇām aśūnyaṃ jetavanadvāram anyatarānyatareṇa ṣaḍvargikeṇa /
V03vinv10_u:12: tenāsau dūrata eva dṛṣṭo bakākāraśirāḥ pralambabhrūḥ /
V03vinv10_u:22: nāyam ācāryaṃ jānīte nāpy upādhyāyam iti /
V03vinv10_u:33: yady evaṃ vihāro 'sau yatra senāṃjayo nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati /
V03vinv10_u:34: tam āgamya vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:36: tam asau pratiśāmya sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā mārgaśrame prativinodite yeṣu kuleṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ piṇḍakā upanibaddhās teṣu bhoktuṃ preṣayati /
V03vinv10_u:37: ācaritaṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇāṃ yat kiṃcid eva śṛṇvanti tad rātrau saṃnipatya parasparam ārocayanti /
V03vinv10_u:38: nandopananda kiyac ciram asmābhiḥ kṛcchram udvoḍhavyam* /
V03vinv10_u:39: asti kiṃcid yuṣmākaṃ kiṃcic chrutaṃ yatrodārāvabhāso bhaved iti /
V03vinv10_u:42: kāśiṣu vāsavagrāmake senāṃjayo nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati /
V03vinv10_u:43: tam āgamya vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ pūrvavad yāvad bhoktuṃ preṣayati /
V03vinv10_u:45: te samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena vāsavagrāmakas tena cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:51: no tu kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣayitavyā iti /
V03vinv10_u:55: nandopananda vayam anena mahallena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:56: no tu kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣitā iti /
V03vinv10_u:58: ekaṃ tāvat saṃpannaṃ kulāny api (286r1 = GBM 6.884) preṣayiṣyatīti /
V03vinv10_u:60: sa tena pratiśāmayitvā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito mārgaśrame prativinodite kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣitaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:63: yadi tāvat pūrvam āgatās te vayam* /
V03vinv10_u:67: so 'nena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣito no tu vayam* /
V03vinv10_u:70: yadi tāvat pūrvam āgatās te vayaṃ pūrvavad yāvat* /
V03vinv10_u:71: sa tvayā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣito no tu vayam* /
V03vinv10_u:78: tais tasyācodayitvāsmārayitvā vastukarmapratijñāyā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv10_u:81: yadi sthāsyāmi vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prasādaṃ pravedayiṣyante /
V03vinv10_u:83: sa samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastī yena cārikāṃ prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ (MSV II 202)
V03vinv10_u:87: senāñjayin prītā vayaṃ tvaddarśanena no tv āgamanena /
V03vinv10_u:89: tvām āgamya vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:92: mama tu ṣaḍvargikair acodayitvāsmārayitvā vastukarmapratijñāyā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kṛtam /
V03vinv10_u:95: te 'vadhyāyantaḥ kṣipanto vivācayanta etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv10_u:97: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo vyagreṇa na bhikṣubhir acodayitvāsmārayitvā vastukarmapratijñayā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kartavyam* /
V03vinv10_u:100: buddho bhagavān caṇpāyāṃ viharati gargāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre /
V03vinv10_u:101: tena khalu samayena ṣaḍvargikā bhikṣava imāny evaṃrūpāṇy adharmakarmāṇi kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:106: tasmān na bhikṣubhir imāny evaṃrūpāṇy adharmakarmāṇi karaṇīyāni /
V03vinv10_u:107: tadyathā adharmeṇa vyagrair adharmeṇa samagraiḥ dharmeṇa vyagraiḥ /
V03vinv10_u:111: na eka ekena na dvau na saṃbahulāḥ kṛtāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:112: na gaṇo gaṇasya karmāṇi paṃca saṃghakarmaṇāṃ svāminaḥ //
V03vinv10_u:114: buddho bhagavān caṇpāyāṃ viharati gargāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre /
V03vinv10_u:115: tena khalu samayena ṣaḍvargikā bhikṣava imāny evaṃrūpāṇy adharmakarmāṇi kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:140: api tu bhikṣavaḥ paṃca saṃghakarmaṇāṃ svāminaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:145: viṃśatir bhikṣavaḥ saṃghaḥ uttare ca / paṃca saṃghāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:146: tatra bhikṣavo yatra catvāro bhikṣavaḥ prativasanti /
V03vinv10_u:147: arhati tatra saṃgho dharmeṇa sarvakarmāṇi kartum* /
V03vinv10_u:148: sthāpayitvā pāṃcānāṃ pravāraṇāṃ daśānām upasaṃpadaṃ viṃśatīnāṃ cāvarhaṇam* /
V03vinv10_u:150: arhati tatra saṃgho dharmeṇa sarvakarmāṇi kartum* /
V03vinv10_u:155: yatra viṃśatir bhikṣavaḥ prativasanti uttare ca /
V03vinv10_u:156: arhati tatra saṃgho dharmeṇa sarvakarmāṇi kartum* /
V03vinv10_u:161: caturvargakaraṇīyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karma ūnāś catvāraḥ kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:169_0: evaṃ śrāmaṇerakaḥ ṣaṇḍhapaṇḍakaḥ bhikṣuṇīdūṣako mātṛghātakaḥ pitṛghātakaḥ arhaghātakaḥ
V03vinv10_u:173: caturvargakaraṇīyaṃ karma pūrṇāś catvāro dharmeṇa kurvanti dharmakarma ca tad vinayakarma ca /
V03vinv10_u:176: caturvargakaraṇīyaṃ karma nāgārikacaturtho na śrāmaṇerakaḥ pūrvavad yāvan na pārivāsikacaturthāḥ kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:181: adharmakarma ca tad (MSV II 205) avinayakarma ca /
V03vinv10_u:184: paṃcavargakaraṇīyaṃ karma āgārikapaṃcamaḥ pūrvavad yāvat pārivāsikapaṃcamāḥ kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:192: paṃcavargakaraṇīyaṃ karma nāgārikapaṃcamā na śrāmaṇerakaḥ pūrvavad yāvan na pārivāsikapaṃcamā dharmeṇa kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:193: (287r1 = GBM 6.886) dharmakarma ca tad vinayakarma ca /
V03vinv10_u:200: daśavargakaraṇīyaṃ karma āgārikadaśamāḥ pūrvavad yāvat pārivāsikadaśamā kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:208: daśavargakaraṇīyaṃ karma nāgārikadaśamāḥ pūrvavad yāvan na pārivāsikadaśamā dharmeṇa kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:216: karma āgārikaviṃśatimāḥ śrāmaṇerakāḥ pūrvavat pārivāsikaviṃśatimāḥ kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:224: viṃśativargakaraṇīyaṃ karma nāgārikaviṃśatimā na śrāmaṇerakāḥ pūrvavad yāvan na pārivāsikaviṃśatimā dharmeṇa kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:229: dharmādharmeṇa yat karma yac ca jñaptitayā kṛtam* /
V03vinv10_u:230: saṃmukhaṃ ca pratijñā ca cakrapeyāla saṅkalāt* //
V03vinv10_u:281_0: amūḍhavinayaṃ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ pratijñākārakaṃ tṛṇaprastārakaṃ tarjanīyaṃ
V03vinv10_u:282: parivāsaṃ mūlaparivāsaṃ mūlāpakarṣaparivāsaṃ mānāpyaṃ mūlamānāpyaṃ mūlāpakarṣamānāpyam āvarhanti /
V03vinv10_u:284: saṃmukhavinayārhāya tu saṃmukhavinayam eva dadāti na smṛtivinayaṃ na yāvad āvarhanti /
V03vinv10_u:288: evaṃ yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvad āvarhanti saṃmukavinayaṃ dadāti /
V03vinv10_u:290: smṛtivinayārhāya tu smṛtivinayam eva dadāti na tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ na yāvat saṃmukhavinayam* /
V03vinv10_u:294: evaṃ yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ yāvat saṃmukhavinayaṃ smṛtivinayaṃ dadāti /
V03vinv10_u:296: amūḍhavinayārhāya tv amūḍhavinayam eva dadāti tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ na yāvat saṃmukhavinayaṃ smṛtivinayaṃ /
V03vinv10_u:301: tatsvabhāvaiṣiyārhāya tu tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam eva dadāti na yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ na yāvad amūḍhavinayam* /
V03vinv10_u:307: yadbhūyaiṣīyārhāya yadbhūyaiṣīyam eva dadāti na tarjanīyaṃ na yāvat tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam* /
V03vinv10_u:309: tarjanīyakarmārhāya nigarhaṇīyaṃ karma kurvanti pratisaṃharaṇīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvad yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ dadāti /
V03vinv10_u:311: tarjanīyakarmārhāya tu tarjanīyam eva karma kurvanti na pariśiṣṭānīti /
V03vinv10_u:312: anayā vartanyā cakrapeyālaḥ pūrvavad yāvad dharmakarma /
V03vinv10_u:320: pravāsanīyakarmārhāya tu pravāsanīyam eva karma kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:324: pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmārhāya tu pratisaṃharaṇīyam eva karma kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:328: adarśanīyotkṣepaṇīyakarmārhāya tv adarśanīyotkṣepaṇīyam eva karma kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:333: apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:335: apratikarmārhāyotkṣepaṇīyakarmārhāya tv apratikarmārhāyotkṣepaṇīyam eva karma (288r1 = GBM 6.888) kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:337: apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīykarmārhāya parivāsaṃ dadāti /
V03vinv10_u:339: apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīykarmārhāya tv apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmaiva kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:343: parivāsakarmārhāya tv aparivāsam eva tu dadāti /
V03vinv10_u:362: āvarhaṇārhāya tv āvarhaṇam eva kurvanti na saṃmukhavinayaṃ dadāti na yāvan mānāpyam* /
V03vinv10_u:364: evam eva navakena cakrapeyālaṃ vistareṇa boddhavyam* /
V03vinv10_u:372: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś chandārhebhyaś ca cchandenānītā bhavanti /
V03vinv10_u:373: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ prativahanti pratikrośanti /
V03vinv10_u:378: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś chandārhebhyaś ca cchandenānītā bhavanti /
V03vinv10_u:379: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti /
V03vinv10_u:386: alajjinaḥ sāntarasya bālasya mūḍhasyāvyaktasyākuśalasya bahiḥsīmāyāṃ sthitasya īryāpathe cyutasya vācā asaṃvṛtasya /
V03vinv10_u:389: prakṛtisthitasya antaḥsīmāyāṃ sthitasya īryāpathād acyutasya vā vācā saṃyatasyeti /
V03vinv10_u:404: tatraikam osāraṇakarma (288v1 = GBM 6.889) yad idaṃ dharmeṇa kurvanti samagrāḥ /
